section.name: Overview
section.p: The Avalon platform includes a set of developer tools that assist in the automation of different process contributing to reliable and consistent component development. These tools include an Ant task supporting meta-info generation for component types and services, and an equivalent Maven plugin.

tr.td: Reference specification of the Javadoc Tags used to support automation of component and service meta info generation.
An Ant task supporting generation of XML or serialized meta-info descriptors.
The Avalon plugin for Maven provides support for meta info generation when building with the Maven tool.
